name: Ext_R3_ExplanationOfBenefit_it_unitPrice
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ExplanationOfBenefit.item.unitPrice for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ExplanationOfBenefit.item.unitPrice from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ExplanationOfBenefit|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Fee, charge or cost per point
element.definition: If the item is a node then this is the fee for the product or service, otherwise this is the total of the fees for the children of the group.
element.comment: `ExplanationOfBenefit.item.unitPrice` maps to R5 `ExplanationOfBenefit.item.unitPrice`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
